title: GraphicalLasso + GaussianMixture
description: Lasso + Gaussian Mixture ModelsWith this kernel I want to demonstrate how to use Gaussian mixture Models (GMM) which have the nice property to train unsupervised, so you can also use the test set. I use Graphical Lasso as an estimator for the initial value of precision matrix (= inverse Covariance) and mean
description_lemmatized: lasso gaussian mixture modelswith kernel want demonstrate use gaussian mixture model gmm nice property train unsupervised also use test set use graphical lasso estimator initial value precision matrix inverse covariance mean
